DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial study compare two different anchorage technique . Adolescent patient need orthodontic treatment randomize Group A B . Both group treat extraction maxillary first premolar fix appliance . Anchorage reinforce miniscrews Group A molarblock Group B . The hypothesis : - miniscrews well anchorage capacity molarblock , - placement miniscrews cause pain discomfort tooth extraction , - molarblock provide increase anchorage - miniscrews cost-efficient conventional anchorage technique ,
DOC.detailed_description: Participants recruit orthodontic specialist clinic Gävle , Sweden . After informed consent participant randomize Group A B . The treatment start extraction maxillary first premolar . Extractions perform participants´ general practitioner . Orthodontic treatment start tooth extraction . All participant get treatment fix appliance accord straight wire concept ( 3M Victory bracket , .022 slot size , McLaughlin-Bennet-Trevesi prescription ) . The recommended wire sequence : .016 Heat Activated Nickel Titanium , .019x.025 Heat Activated Nickel Titanium , .019x.025 Stainless Steel . Treatment time two year . The following measurement take : T0 ( Before treatment start ) : Study model , baseline questionnaire , T1 ( tooth extraction , orthodontic treatment ) : Study model , cephalographic x-ray , questionnaire even tooth extraction , questionnaire one week tooth extraction . T2 ( After miniscrew placement ( Group A ) , Before space closure ) : Study model , cephalographic x-ray , questionnaire evening miniscrew placement , questionnaire one week miniscrew placement . T3 ( After space closure miniscrew removal ) : Study model , cephalographic x-ray , questionnaire screw removal
DOC.criteria: Adolescents need orthodontic treatment fix appliance include extraction maxillary first premolar Need Anchorage reinforcement Permanent dentition include maxillary second molar occlusion Regular dental care since age three . Experience previous orthodontic treatment Need orthognathic surgery Need maximum anchorage .
